name: ibm
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing IBM Cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`ibm` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/ibm-cloud/terraform-provider-ibm).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing IBM Cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/ibm-cloud/terraform-provider-ibm)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi/pulumi-ibm` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-ibm/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`ibm-cloud/terraform-provider-ibm` repo](https://github.com/ibm-cloud/terraform-provider-ibm/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/ibm-cloud/terraform-provider-ibm)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi/pulumi-ibm` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-ibm/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`ibm-cloud/terraform-provider-ibm` repo](https://github.com/ibm-cloud/terraform-provider-ibm/issues).

bluemixApiKey.deprecationMessage: This field is deprecated please use ibmcloud_api_key

bluemixTimeout.description: The timeout (in seconds) to set for any Bluemix API calls made.
bluemixTimeout.deprecationMessage: This field is deprecated please use ibmcloud_timeout

endpointsFilePath.description: Path of the file that contains private and public regional endpoints mapping

functionNamespace.deprecationMessage: This field will be deprecated soon

generation.description: Generation of Virtual Private Cloud. Default is 2
generation.deprecationMessage: The generation field is deprecated and will be removed after couple of releases

iaasClassicTimeout.description: The timeout (in seconds) to set for any Classic Infrastructure API calls made.

iaasClassicUsername.description: The Classic Infrastructure API user name

ibmcloudTimeout.description: The timeout (in seconds) to set for any IBM Cloud API calls made.

maxRetries.description: The retry count to set for API calls.

riaasEndpoint.description: The next generation infrastructure service endpoint url.
riaasEndpoint.deprecationMessage: This field is deprecated use generation

softlayerApiKey.deprecationMessage: This field is deprecated please use iaas_classic_api_key

softlayerEndpointUrl.deprecationMessage: This field is deprecated please use iaas_classic_endpoint_url

softlayerTimeout.description: The timeout (in seconds) to set for any SoftLayer API calls made.
softlayerTimeout.deprecationMessage: This field is deprecated please use iaas_classic_timeout

softlayerUsername.deprecationMessage: This field is deprecated please use iaas_classic_username

visibility.description: Visibility of the provider if it is private or public.

zone.description: The IBM cloud Region zone (for example 'us-south-1') for power resources.

provider.description:
The provider type for the ibm package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.
